Title: ]project-open[ Project Management
Description:
]project-open[ is a web-based project management system for medium sized organizations. 
]po[ includes project management, project portfolio management, collaboration, time sheet management, finanicial controlling and invoicing.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
]project-open[ is a web-based project management system for medium sized organizations.
]po[ includes project management, project portfolio management, collaboration, time sheet management, finanicial controlling and invoicing.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
